root_causes.label: Insufficient confidence uplift to GREEN threshold
root_causes.note: Confidence plateaued at 0.15 after +0.03 delta in 179. GREEN typically requires 0.20+. Approximated weight_map may limit signal coherence.

root_causes.label: Approximated fusion artifacts limit confidence gain
root_causes.note: weight_map_latest and confidence_vector marked approximate. Smooth re-estimate could unlock +0.01-0.02 confidence gain.

root_causes.label: Missing ensemble_3 contribution (quarantine persists)
root_causes.note: ensemble_3 remains quarantined (Instruction 180 failed). Even with 4 active members normalized, single-member loss limits upside.

remediation_options.expected_outcome: Confidence 0.15 -> 0.20; attempt GREEN with smoother weights

remediation_options.action: Extended weight re-estimation from fresh baseline
remediation_options.expected_outcome: Potential +0.03 confidence but high complexity; defer unless other fails

remediation_options.action: Accept YELLOW, document as stable, prepare for Phase C
remediation_options.expected_outcome: Exit with confidence that system is robust; proceed to safe-mode exit
